scripts.preinstall: npm install --prefix server && npm install --prefix client && cd client && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.build: concurrently "cd client && yarn build" "cd server && yarn build"
scripts.deploy: yarn build && git add . && git commit -m "Building for production" && git push heroku master
scripts.start: concurrently "cd client && PORT=3000 yarn start" "cd server && PORT=3001 yarn start"
